content: special thanks to darski for both naming the square and testing the pattern for me please let me know if you have any problems http //i120 photobucket com/albums/o /8insquare jpg eternity squared 8 inch square materials h hook 5mm worsted weight yarn directions ch4 join with a slip_stitch into first chain round 1 ch1 8 single_crochet in loop join with slip_stitch to first single_crochet round 2 ch3 single_crochet in next st around join in 1st chain 8 chain-3 loops made round 3 working behind ch3 loops made on previous round and into single_crochet of round 1 slip_stitch into next single_crochet ch3 counts as 1st double_crochet here on in 2 double_crochet in same st 3dc in next single_crochet around join with slip_stitch to 3rd chain of first ch3 24 double_crochet round 4 ch3 skip next double_crochet single_crochet into next double_crochet around join w/ slip_stitch in 1st chain 12 ch3 loops round 5 ch4 single_crochet in next single_crochet around join w/ slip_stitch in 1st chain 12 ch4 loops round 6 slip_stitch into next ch4 loop ch1 single_crochet half_double_crochet double_crochet half_double_crochet single_crochet into same loop single_crochet half_double_crochet double_crochet half_double_crochet single_crochet into next loop around join with a slip_stitch into single_crochet 12 petals round 7 working behind r6 petals double_crochet ch2 double_crochet into ch3 space from round 4 around join w/ a slip_stitch to 1st double_crochet 12 v-stitches round 8 ch3 3 double_crochet in ch2 space double_crochet in next double_crochet double_crochet in next double_crochet 3 double_crochet in next ch2 space double_crochet in next double_crochet around join with slip_stitch to 3rd chain of ch3 60 double_crochet round 9 ch1 single_crochet in same st single_crochet in next st single_crochet through both double_crochet of petal from round 6 and next double_crochet single_crochet in next 4 double_crochet of round 8 around single_crochet in next 2 sts join with slip_stitch to 1st single_crochet 60 single_crochet round 10 ch3 double_crochet in next 2 single_crochet half_double_crochet in next 2 single_crochet single_crochet in next 5 single_crochet half_double_crochet in next 2 single_crochet double_crochet in next 2 single_crochet 2dc in next single_crochet ch1 2 double_crochet in next single_crochet corner made 4 times omitting last double_crochet and joining with slip_stitch to 3rd chain of first double_crochet round 11 ch4 skip next st double_crochet ch1 in next double_crochet 7 times skip next st double_crochet ch1 double_crochet ch3 double_crochet ch1 double_crochet ch1 all in corner ch1 space skip next st double_crochet ch1 in next double_crochet 8 times skip next st double_crochet ch1 double_crochet ch3 double_crochet ch1 double_crochet ch1 all in corner ch1 space 3 times join with slip_stitch to 3rd chain of first ch4 12 double_crochet on each side round 12 ch3 double_crochet in ea space and double_crochet across 2dc ch1 2dc in each corner ch3 space join with slip_stitch to 3rd chain of first double_crochet
